hiveArticle.title: Photography of Flowers
hiveArticle.body:
Some of the beautiful flowers photo which I captured today with my Nokia 6 Smartphone. The images were taken in a nearby park and please don't ask me the name of the flower as I don't know even the name of one. If you know the name of the flowers please do comment. 

![IMG_20171126_093235.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmYryaosqAcAuZxkx7in3MsofrkRPyC9JPjwCjZnqToYh6/IMG_20171126_093235.jpg)

![IMG_20171126_093310.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmW2ypNaVVvcgprmdz2FwLrxzXMd2QAsgquRywYGHvht8k/IMG_20171126_093310.jpg)

![IMG_20171126_093255.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmVvqJzLZZYAYGPbTZXFrBG62MiRduvJFmfVqyLMM2t66S/IMG_20171126_093255.jpg)

![IMG_20171126_093240.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmXMckjvaKExxN383tVX2QCnkTEtVi4uWaEBXTirz24xVk/IMG_20171126_093240.jpg)

![IMG_20171126_093641.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmXzkeZ7NLoe31W41eGdiUjRreGRxdtb6CswEth6RqdnRp/IMG_20171126_093641.jpg)
